text: The Particular Cowboys is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Frances Ne Moyer - Muriel * Raymond McKee - Jake * Ben Walker - Bill * Oliver Hardy - A Cowboy (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:1914 short films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films
title: The Particular Cowboys
